enWisdom: The disbeliever is an immoral, ignorant person
The disbeliever is ill-tempered and has an evil manner
The disbeliever is a misguiding deceiver, hard-hearted, [and] perfidious

Wisdom: الْكَافِرُ خَبٌّ لَئِيمٌ خَئُونٌ مَغْرُورٌ بِجَهْلِهِ مَغْبُونٌ
enWisdom: The disbeliever is a vile deceiver, perfidious, deluded by his ignorance and duped

Wisdom: الْكَافِرُ الدُّنْيَا جَنَّتُهُ وَالْعَاجِلَةُ هِمَّتُهُ وَالْمَوْتُ شَقَاوَتُهُ وَالنَّارُ غَايَتُهُ
enWisdom: For the disbeliever, this world is his Paradise, the transient is what he strives for, death is [the cause of] his wretchedness and hellfire is his final end

Wisdom: هَمُّ الْكَافِرِ لِدُنْيَاهُ وَسَعْيُهُ لِعَاجِلَتِهِ وَغَايَتُهُ شَهْوَتُهُ
enWisdom: The concern of the disbeliever is for his [life in this] world, his efforts are for the transient [pleasures] and his goal is [fulfilling] his lust
